para.text: The person’s right to participate as a member in the management and conduct of the association’s activities and affairs terminates; and

Subject to § 29-1011.03, subchapter XV of this chapter, and Chapter 2 of this title, any financial rights owned by the person in the person’s capacity as a member are owned by the person as a transferee.

A person’s dissociation as a member shall not of itself discharge the person from any debt, obligation, or other liability to the limited cooperative association or to the members which the person incurred while a member.

annotations.annotation: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-210 rewrote the section.
annotations.text: Application of Law 19-210: Section 7 of D.C. Law 19-210 provided that the act shall apply as of January 1, 2012.
Uniform Law: This section is based on § 1102 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act.
